title: HTML Lists
description: Create ordered and unordered lists using <ul>, <ol>, and <li> tags.

examples.output: Displays a bullet list of fruits and a numbered list of steps.

constraints: Include at least three <li> items in each list.
starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <title>List Example</title>
</head>

  <!-- Add your lists here -->
</body>
</html>
